mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pw, name, birth, email, tel) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{tel})
mapper.select: select id, pw, name, birth, email, tel, to_char(wdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') wdate, grade from member where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update member set name=#{name},birth=#{birth}, email=#{email}, tel=#{tel} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, pw, name, birth, email, tel, to_char(wdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') wdate, grade from member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.update: update member set pw=#{pw} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rnum, id, pw, name, birth, email, tel, to_char(wdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') wdate, grade from member where id != 'master' ) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
mapper.update: update member set grade=#{grade} where id=#{id}
